mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GPS_TABLE ( USER_SEQ, GPS_RENEW_DATE, GPS_SIDO, GPS_SIGUNGU, GPS_DONG, GPS_X, GPS_Y ) VALUES ( #{user_seq}, #{gps_renew_date}, #{gps_sido}, #{gps_sigungu}, #{gps_dong}, #{gps_x}, #{gps_y} )
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_INFO UI SET UI.GPS_SEQ = ( SELECT GT.GPS_SEQ FROM ( SELECT GPST.*, @RNUM := @RNUM+1 ROWNUM FROM GPS_TABLE GPST, (SELECT @RNUM:=0) R WHERE GPST.USER_SEQ = #{user_seq} ORDER BY GPST.GPS_RENEW_DATE DESC ) GT WHERE GT.ROWNUM = 1 ) WHERE UI.USER_SEQ = #{user_seq}
